metadata.title: CVE-2021-47490 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/ttm: fix memleak in ttm_transfered_destroyWe need to cleanup the fences for ghost objects as well.Bug: https://bugzilla.kernel.org/show_bug.cgi?id=214029Bug: https://bugzilla.kernel.org/show_bug.cgi?id=214447

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
